Source code

  1. #ifndef _SYS_WAIT_H
  2. ‌#define _SYS_WAIT_H

  4. #include <sys/types.h>

  6. ‌#define _LOW(v)                ( (v) & 0377)
  7. ‌#define _HIGH(v)        ( ((v) >> 8) & 0377)

  9. /* options for waitpid, WUNTRACED not supported */
  10. ‌#define WNOHANG                1
  11. ‌#define WUNTRACED        2

  13. ‌#define WIFEXITED(s)        (!((s)&0xFF)
  14. ‌#define WIFSTOPPED(s)        (((s)&0xFF)==0x7F)
  15. ‌#define WEXITSTATUS(s)        (((s)>>8)&0xFF)
  16. ‌#define WTERMSIG(s)        ((s)&0x7F)
  17. ‌#define WSTOPSIG(s)        (((s)>>8)&0xFF)
  18. ‌#define WIFSIGNALED(s)        (((unsigned int)(s)-1 & 0xFFFF) < 0xFF)

  20. pid_t wait(int *stat_loc);
  21. pid_t waitpid(pid_t pid, int *stat_loc, int options);

  23. #endif
